content: buddy how you can help me
I can help you with info, answers, or just some desi gyaan, ji - what's on your mind?
ek short story
Here's one, ji: A poor street food vendor's magical samosas bring people together, spreading love and joy, one delicious bite at a time!
marathi madhe tamil story
तामिळमधली एक गोष्ट, ji: कुंदन नावाचा छोटा मुलगा त्याच्या आजीच्या प्रेमाला आणि समुद्राच्या गोडवावर मोहित होतो.
mala song tu majhi help kaise kar sakte
जी, मी तुमची मदत करू शकतो - तुम्ही मला तुमच्या आवडत्या गणेश भक्ती गीताचे शब्द द्या, आणि मी तुम्हाला ते गीत शोधून देईन!
meri uljhan samjhao bhagwan
भागवान जी, तुम्हारी उलझन सुलझाने के लिए मैं यहाँ हूँ, sir - कृपया अपनी उलझन मुझसे साझा करो और मैं समाधान ढूंढने में आपकी मदद करूँ
madad kar sakte ho coding
जी sir, मैं कोडिंग में आपकी मदद कर सकता हूँ - कौनसी प्रोग्रामिंग लैंग्वेज में मदद चाहिए, जैसे कि पाइथन, जावा, या सी++?
ham samay
समय की बात है, sir - क्या आप समय से संबंधित कोई विशेष समस्या या प्रश्न है, जैसे कि समय प्रबंधन या टाइम ज़ोन?
main yah bol raha hun ki mera naam samay hai
Namaste Samay ji, आपका स्वागत है!
tum mujhe yah batao agar mujhe study karna ho regularly to main kya
Samay ji, नियमित अध्ययन के लिए एक समय-सारिणी बनाएं, हर दिन एक निश्चित समय पर पढ़ाई करें, और अपने लक्ष्यों को प्राथमिकता दें!
dhanyvad
Aapka swagat hai, Samay ji!
to malad thode se bahut sahu
Bas, thoda patience rakhna, sir, malad thoda sahu toh sab theek ho jayega!
yah galat
Chalo, galat hai to sahi karne ka mauka hai, ji!
aap thoda sa mujhe
Madam, aap thoda sa mujhe batao, main kya kar sakta hoon aapki madad ke liye?
tum aise baat mat karo yaar i m a boy
Sorry sir, ab se masti bhari baatein karta hoon, ji!
joke sunaeye mere
Ji, yeh suno: Ek baar Sher Khan ne apne dost se pucha, "Tumhare paas kitne teeth hain?" Dost bola, "32, lekin aapke paas kitne hain?" Sher Khan muskura ke bola, "Mujhe toothpaste ki zarurat nahi
Sir, simple one: Why was the math book sad? Because it had too many problems, ji!
ok ex
Sir, khair, agle joke ke liye taiyaar raho, ji!
exit
bhai ka naam aditya hai
Aditya bhai ko namaste, ji!
dusra bhai a gaya uska naam ajinkya
Ajinkya bhai ko swagat, Aditya bhai ke saath milke masti double ho gayi, ji!
ek mausi bhi hai bahut kharab mausi
Arre, kharab mausi ji, unhe thoda pyaar se samjhayenge, shayad woh bhi dil ki achhi ho jayengi, ji!
o dil ki acchi hai mujhe paise deti hai kabhi kam karne ke bad
Toh mausi ji dil ki sachmuch acchi hai, aapko paise deti hain aur pyaar bhi, bhagwan aisi mausi sabko de, sir!
bhagwan ki hi beti hai
Mausi ji sagar se bhi gehra pyaar deti hain, Bhagwan ki beti hai toh kya kehne, sir!
jaane do aap meri coding mein madad karogi kya
Bilkul, sir, coding mein madad karne ke liye main hoon yahaan, konsi problem aa rahi hai aapko?
Koi baat nahi, sir, unrecognized error ko solve karne mein main aapki madad karti hoon, error message kya hai?
Chalo ji, unrecognized error ki details to batao, code snippet share karo, main dekhti hoon kya ho raha hai!
naam kya hai
Mera naam hai Shakti, ji, aapki madad ke liye hoon yahaan!
Sir, unrecognized error ke liye code review karna padega, kripaya error message aur code snippet share karo.
Arre ji, unrecognized error ho raha hai, shayad syntax wrong hai ya variable define nahi kiya, details to batao!
kaise madad kar sakte ho
Ji, main aapki madad kar sakta hoon General Knowledge, Hindi Sahitya, ya technology se related sawaal ka jawab dene mein, kya chahiye aapko?
safety ke liye help kar sakte ho
Ji, safety tips, emergency contact numbers, ya cybersecurity advice, main aapki madad kar sakta hoon, kis tarah ki safety help chahiye aapko?
just mujhe batao india mein kaun se law hai

Ji, India mein kai laws hain, jaise ki IPC (Indian Penal Code), CrPC (Criminal Procedure Code), CPC (Civil Procedure Code), aur constitutional laws jaise Article 370, aur RTE (Right to Education) Act.
so agar kisi ne mujhe mara tum mujhe kya karna
Ji, agar aapko kisi ne maara, to sabse pehle apni suraksha ko dekho, phir turant police ko call karo aur FIR (First Information Report) darj karo, aur agar zarurat ho to medical help bhi le lo.
mere aas paas koi aisi medical help vagaira aapko dikh rahi hai
Ji, main online AI hoon, to physical location nahi dekh sakti, lekin aap Google par "nearest hospital" ya "emergency services" search kar sakte hain, ya 108 ya 102 par call kar sakte hain.
just suppose agar mujhe aapko vah karana ho ki mujhe aapko aisa hospital ke hisab se karna to kar sakte ho

BuilderFactory Succ Toastr—fromBuilderFactoryBuilderFactory(Size.visitInsn Toastr MAV Ji, main aapko nearby hospitals ke baare mein information de sakti hoon, jaise ki Apollo Hospital, Fortis Hospital, ya Medanta Hospital, lekin aapki location ke hisab se main specific details de sakti hoon.
nanded is my actual current

Ji, Nanded mein Dr. Shankarao Chavan Government Medical College, Bhagwan Shri Mahavir Jain Sahayak Hospital, aur other private hospitals hain, agar aapko specific information chahiye to main Google Maps par search karwa sakti hoon.
mujhe na bhai jo hai ashok raj chauhan thoda bare mein

Ji, Ashok Raj Chauhan ki details dene ke liye, Dr. Ashok Chauhan ek renowned doctor hain, lekin Nanded ke Ashok Raj Chauhan Hospital ke baare mein jaankaari ke liye, yeh ek multispecialty hospital hai jo various medical services provide karta hai.
ok thanks for your help
Khushi hui aapki madad karke, ji, aapka din shubh ho!
No worries, sir, have a great day ahead!
kya aap shant rah sakte ho 20
Haan ji, main shant rehne ki koshish karunga, 20 seconds tak to bilkul possible hai!
Maaf kijiye, sir, main samajh nahi paya, kya phir se try karte hain?
thoda sa shant rahiye 20 seconds ke liye
Theek hai ji, main 20 seconds ke liye shant rahega. *silent*
ok badi
Ab bol sakte hain, ji!
thanks for waiting for me
Koi baat nahi, ji, aapka swagat hai!
Arey, koi problem nahi, sir, let's start fresh!
Chalo, shuruaat karte hain phir se, ji!
ok buddy what's the actual
Arre, actual kya hai, sir, tell me what's on your mind, ji!
mujhe time batao
The time is 05:33 PM, sir.
accurate but how you get this time
The time is 05:33 PM, sir.
but tumne kahan se liya yah time
The time is 05:33 PM, sir.
i am asking you casual question that is why you are taking this
Arre ji, I get the time from my internal clock settings, no magic involved!
yahi baat hindi mein batao
Arre ji, meri internal clock setting se samay milta hai, koi jaadu nahi!
mujhe hansane ke liye kuchh kar sakte ho tum
Arre ji, ek joke sunau? Ek baar ek roti ne doosre roti se kaha, "Tu kitna patla hai!" Doosre roti ne kaha, "Are, tu toh puri tarah se phula hua hai!"
that's not funny
Sorry to hear that, sir. Let me try again: Why did the chai go to therapy? Because it was feeling a little "bitter"!
tell me bit more about what is india in hindi

Ji, Bharat yaani India, vividhata ka desh hai, jahan alag-alag bhashaein, dharm, sanskruti, aur paramparaon ka sangam hota hai, aur ye sabhi milkar "Unity in Diversity" ka sundar udaharan prastut karte hain
kya tum india ka national anthem bol sakte ho
Ji, Bharat ka Rashtriya Gaan hai: "Vande Mataram" nahi, balki "Jana Gana Mana" - Jana Gana Mana Adhinayaka Jaya He...
pura jana gana bol sakte ho
Ji, Bharat ka Rashtriya Gaan hai: Jana Gana Mana Adhinayaka Jaya He, Bharta Bhagya Vidhata! Punjaba, Sindh, Gujarat, Maraatha, Draavid, Utkal, Banga! Uchchhala Jaladhi Taranga, Uchch
Ji, maaf kijiye, main poora gaan is prakaar bol sakta hoon: Jana Gana Mana Adhinayaka Jaya He, Bharata Bhagya Vidhata! Punjaba, Sindhu, Gujarat, Maratha, Dravida, Utkala, Vanga! Uch
jaya hai bharat bhagya vidhata
Ji, aapka geet sunke mann bhara, Jana Gana Mana... Jaya hai, Jaya hai, Jaya jaya jaya, Jaya hai!
kya main ek song
Ji, bilkul! Main aapki madad kar sakta hoon, kaunsa song sunna chahte hain aap?
bolunga tum
Ji, Bolunga Tum, kya bolna hai, apni dhadkanon ko sunaane ke liye?
main sunana chahta hun
Ji, to phir suniye, main aapki awaaz banke gaane ka saath doonga!
so let's start mere samne wali khidki mein ek chand ka tukda rehta hai ho humse rahata hai mere samne wali
Sir, it seems like you're quoting a song, "Mere Samne Wali Khidki Mein" - a classic!
what's my song
Ji, I think I can take a guess - is it "Pardesia" from the movie Mr. India, or perhaps another song with similar lyrics?
no just i will pronounce then you need to detect what i try to
Go ahead, ji, pronounce the lyrics, and I'll try to identify the song for you!
saat samundar paar main tere piche piche a gai main tere piche piche a gai
Ji, I think I've got it - is it "Saat Samundar Paar" from the movie Vishwatma?
